scripts.db:migrate: docker exec -i issue-tracker-db psql -U postgres -d issue_tracker < issue-tracker-backend/src/db/migrations/001_create_issues.sql
scripts.db:seed: docker exec -i issue-tracker-db psql -U postgres -d issue_tracker < issue-tracker-backend/src/db/seed.sql
scripts.db:psql: docker exec -it issue-tracker-db psql -U postgres -d issue_tracker
scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.build: npm run build:backend && npm run build:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:up && timeout /t 5 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.setup:unix: npm run install:all && npm run db:up && sleep 5 && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
